remarks:
` 1 ` is a real number.  This used to be one of our postulates for complex numbers, but Eric Schmidt discovered that it could be derived from a weaker postulate, ~ ax-1cn , by exploiting properties of the imaginary unit ` _i ` .  (Contributed by Eric Schmidt, 11-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.) 

---

 ` 1 ` is a real number.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 13-Jan-2020.)
